nodes.bodyText: A setter would take the full map, not a single key value pair. So I just renamed this to more accurately describe what this method does
We don't plan on extending this class, so let's make it final
This functions aren't present in the AppConfiguration sample project, and we don't need them
How would we configure the service version?
It's already baked into the http pipeline instance here

Even before this PR, we never actually used the service API version that was set in the client builder. Right now, our protocol layer has it hardcoded and has no way to set it. I'll touch base with Srikanta about this
